derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Latin from Greek empeirikos, from empeiria 'experience', from empeiros 'skilled' (based on peira 'trial, experiment')

means.word_mean: 2. derived from experiment and observation rather than theory;

"an empirical treatment of a disease about which little is known"
